summary: While on a South Seas trip, a professor falls in love and marries an exotic native woman. What he doesn't know is that she was raised by superstitious natives who believe her to be some ... See full summary »
cast: Lon Chaney Jr.|Anne Gwynne|Evelyn Ankers|Ralph Morgan|Elisabeth Risdon|Lois Collier|Harry Hayden|Elizabeth Russell|Phil Brown|Kay Harding|Gertrude Astor|Chuck Hamilton|David Hoffman|William Hudson|Hanna Kaapa|Edmund Mortimer|Larry Steers|Milburn Stone
title: Amenaza incógnita
